bike.description: M5 manipulated alloy, ORE TT/DT, tapered and forged HT, ISCG mount, 142mm dropouts, full cartridge bearing pivots and shock yoke, replaceable derailleur hanger, derailleur guard, 180mm travel

components.description: Fox DHX RC4, coil over w/piggy back, rebound and High/Low speed compression and bottom-out control adj., 8.5x2.5", S:450, M:500, L:550
2014 butted alloy, single bolt setback, 30.9mm, S/M: 350mm, others: 400mm
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard anodized alloy collar w/ QR, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
